_sText:
I just finished the fixed version which addressed the clipping issues as well as a couple other things too. Read below for a complete list of changes. Please download it and give me any feedback you have good or bad. This will be the first peice that I can start my portfolio with.

Map Name: de_dam_facility_fixed

Author: Joe Motz
Release Date: 3/12/06
Fixed Release: 4/23/06

Number of Spawn Points: 30 vs. 30.

Also, thanks to everyone who has helped me with this map. It's been a long time coming but overall a whole lot of fun. Please spread the word and get this map on servers. Tell your admins that you wanna play it. Also a huge thanks goes out to BarnDoor for making a kickass nav file.

Changelog:
- Moved trash cans in garage so you can jump on them and over for quicker access through the garage coming from the back way.

- You can now jump through the upstairs windows. in the building. Windows to closed offices are still unaccessable.

- Added short B route to map. Too many people were boosting so I decided to make it legit.

- Removed forklift from B and replaced it with control booth. Too many people were camping by the forklift. Too good of cover, had to mix it up a little.

- imporved bot mesh thanks to BarnDoor : http://www.tequilakawa.plus.com/

- moved a light in the vent.

- added a few more props to the computer room.

- moved location of one of the opening point cameras. Looks down alley now.

- changed crate in A to allow players to jump onto it.

- one door at ct spawn leading into the building will always stay open.

- opened ip the hallway at one of the corners in the office on the bottom floor.

- Clipped random areas to prevent players from dropping the bomb "out-of-play"

- Optimized both teams spawn points for better spread of players

- added more optimizations to map for slightly smoother gameplay.

- Fixed CT's spawning outside buyzone.
